title: A publishing of the peace vpon earth and of the gratious tyme and acceptable yeare of the Lorde, which is now in the last tyme & out of the peace of Iesu christ and out of his holie spirit of loue; published by HN, and on the earth. Wherewith all men that make warre by battaile one against another, ... Translated out of Base-almayne into English.
author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?
notes: Translated by Christopher Vitell from the original by Hendrik Niclaes.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
